Plot: Before thirty-five girls were chosen to compete in the Selection... Before Aspen broke America's heart... There was another girl in Prince Maxon's life... Don't miss this thrilling 64-page original novella set in the world of the New York Times bestselling novel The Selection . Also features a teaser to The Elite , Kiera Cass's hotly anticipated sequel to The Selection .
Characters: America Singer, Prince Maxon, King Clarkson Schreave, Daphne (divers)
